comments.body: Some more rules-1. Gambling Currency must not be JET and CANDY. It must be any cryptocurrency available in Coins.game, since the minimum bet is $0.20, better if you play with any stablecoin.2. All 6 prizes are required to have at least a 5x multiplier on Coins.game original Crash game to be eligible. The game- https://coins.game/?game=crash3. 6th prize, the random winner will be picked from all the participants by this giveaway manager- https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/4. We reserve the right to change any rules, however, only changes that make sense.5. The reward will be paid directly to your Bitcoin address.Submit your entry in the below formation-Code:Screenshot of your bet with bet ID:Coins.game Username:Multiplier:Your BTC SegWit address:New rules added-1. In case of a draw, both will share the prize. Check reference

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: New rules applied.In case of a draw, both will share the prize.For example, right now-Learn Bitcoin and xLays have 25x and they are leading the contest. So, they will share 1st and 2nd prizes.In the case of 5th and 6th (if both have the same multiplier.), they will only share the 5th prize.
